    public class WebSession
extends org.apache.wicket.authroles.authentication.AuthenticatedWebSession
    Represents an authenticated web session.

      • checkSessionExpired

        public void checkSessionExpired()
        Checks if the session is expired. Throws a RestartResponseException to send the user to the sign-in page if the session user is invalid.

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password)
        Authenticates a user by username and password.
        Specified by:
        authenticate in class org.apache.wicket.authroles.authentication.AuthenticatedWebSession
        Parameters:
        username - the username of a user
        password - the password of a user
        Returns:
        True if the user could be authenticated, false if username and password don’t match or no matching user could be found.
        See Also:
        AuthenticatedWebSession.authenticate(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

      • getRoles

        public org.apache.wicket.authroles.authorization.strategies.role.Roles getRoles()
        Returns the roles of the web session user.
        Specified by:
        getRoles in class org.apache.wicket.authroles.authentication.AbstractAuthenticatedWebSession
        Returns:
        The roles of the web session user or null if no user id is set yet.
